original_title: Ojepota rai va’e regua - Sobre aquele que quase se transformou
overview: A newlywed young man, when going to the woods to check his animal traps, is constantly harassed by his younger sister-in-law. But after going back to the village, he finds out she never left the place. Short film made during audiovisual workshops in the Guarani village Tenonde Porã.
title: Ojepota rai va’e regua - Sobre aquele que quase se transformou
